That's a great idea! Storing your winter accessories like hats, gloves, and scarves in the stackable plastic bins will keep them organized, protected, and easy to find when you need them. And, by cleaning them before storing them, you'll ensure they're fresh and clean for next winter.

Cleaning your winter accessories before storing them is an important step to prevent the buildup of dirt, dust, and moisture that can cause damage or odors. Here are some quick tips for cleaning your winter accessories:

* Hats: Gently brush off any dirt or debris with a soft-bristled brush. If your hat is made of wool or fleece, you can hand wash it in cold water with a mild detergent. Air dry or tumble dry on a low setting.
* Gloves: Wipe down your gloves with a damp cloth to remove any dirt or debris. If your gloves are made of wool or fleece, you can hand wash them in cold water with a mild detergent. Air dry or tumble dry on a low setting.
* Scarves: Gently hand wash your scarves in cold water with a mild detergent. Air dry or tumble dry on a low setting.

By cleaning and storing your winter accessories properly, you'll be able to enjoy them for many winters to come.
